stdout:
Table	Create Table
defects	CREATE TABLE `defects` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `taskId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('CAR','PAR','NCR') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'CAR',
  `checklistId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `checklistItemId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `checklistItemResultId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `photoUrls` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('reported','rca_pending','action_plan','assigned','in_progress','implemented','verification','effectiveness_check','closed','rejected','analysis','resolved') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'reported',
  `severity` enum('low','medium','high','critical') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  `rootCause` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `correctiveAction` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `preventiveAction` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `dueDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `ncrLevel` enum('major','minor') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `assignedTo` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `reportedBy` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `resolvedBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `resolvedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `verifiedBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `verifiedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `verificationComment` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `resolutionPhotoUrls` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `resolutionComment` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `resolutionNotes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `closureNotes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `implementationMethod` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `beforePhotos` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `afterPhotos` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `taskIdx` (`taskId`),
  KEY `statusIdx` (`status`),
  KEY `assignedToIdx` (`assignedTo`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=180001
